s: Since 1957, we have been dedicated to designing and constructing the world's best climbing, skiing & mountain gear.

t: Black Diamond® Equipment | Climb. Ski. Run. Hike.
s: At Black Diamond, we strive to be one with the sports we serve. Whether you climb, ski, run, or hike, our mission is to create the most trusted and innovative gear and apparel for every pursuit—so you can push higher, go farther, and move with purpose in the places that move you.
Made in the USA since 1881. Together, we explore the limits of fabric to craft durable outdoor gear with passion, creativity, and pride.
Check out men's jackets, pants, shorts, puffys, hoodys, tees & more. Built to the same exacting standards as BD equipment, because apparel is gear.

March 26, 2025 - Over the years, Black Diamond has acquired and integrated several gear companies into its line, including Bibler tents (1997), Ascension climbing skins (1999), and Franklin climbing products (1998).

t: REI – Top-Brand Clothing, Gear, Footwear and Expert Advice for All Your Outdoor Adventures | REI Co-op
s: From backpacking to cycling to staying in shape and more, outfit your outdoor activities with the latest gear, clothing, and footwear at REI.
Black Diamond continues to introduce cutting-edge climbing & skiing gear year after year. Shop skis, gloves, headlamps, climbing harnesses, & more on Backcountry.com.

Discover emerging new brands and shop our latest handpicked gear collections. At Gear.com, we tell stories about the creators behind gear that we love and sell. Gear collections for any adventure.

t: BLACK DIAMOND - Shop Online with Algonquin Outfitters
s: Black Diamond Here at Black Diamond, it’s all about climbing and skiing.
